publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-8154 Bruce Crawford on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Local Electoral Administration (Scotland) Billâ€”That the Parliament agrees that, during Stage 3 of the Local Electoral Administration (Scotland) Bill, debate on amendment 1 shall, subject to Rule 9.8.4A, be brought to a conclusion no later than five minutes after the Stage begins (excluding any periods when other business is under consideration or when a meeting of the Parliament is suspended or otherwise not in progress). Supported by: Jim Mather*
